exceptions.tactic: intros E t T H x U E' H0 H1.
induction H; intros; simpl; rewrite H1.
exceptions.exn: The reference H1 was not found in the current environment.
In environment E : env ty t : term T : ty H : j E t T x : nat U : ty E' : env ty H0 : insert x U E = E' Unable to unify "j ?M1737 (TVar ?M1738) ?M1739" with "j E' (shift x t) T".
Cannot find an homogeneous relation to rewrite.

original: intros E t T H x U E' H0 H1. induction H; intros; simpl; rewrite H1. - apply JVar. rewrite H1 in H. apply H. - apply JAbs. apply IHj. intros. destruct x0; simpl. reflexivity. apply H2. - apply JApp with (T1:=T1)(T2:=T2). apply IHj1. apply H0. apply IHj2. apply H0. - apply JTyAbs. rewrite map_shift_id. apply IHj. intros. simpl. destruct x0; reflexivity. - apply JTyApp with (U':=U'). apply IHj. apply H0. reflexivity.
